name: Demortal
description:
Discover spells and discover ritual that had gone wrong.

Bring your daughter back but try not to let something else through!

This game was done to 2021 GameOff and it was also my first try to do 3d game for gamejam. I participated solo.

Theme was BUG

I didn't have idea, until I started learning 3d terrain and got idea of withces hut. Then it got to my mind that coding is basicly spellcrafting with its own magic words and rules. What if there was a bug in some bigger spell?
